short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make Facebook boring rather than addictive

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension hides stories, images, and videos on Facebook, replacing them with a subtle gray background and applying a 100% grayscale filter to the entire page. Stay focused on text-based content and meaningful interactions without the distraction of visual media. Perfect for users looking to minimize time spent on social media or seeking a more mindful online experience.

Features:
- Apply a grayscale filter to Facebook
- Hide stories from your feed
- Hide images and videos
- Replace visual media with gray backgrounds

Simplify your social media browsing and enhance your productivity with a more subdued Facebook interface.
